abstractText: A Nepalese paper manuscript containing invocations to Avalokiteśvata and the Sukhāvatiloka, allegedly called Stutidharmaśāstra in the long colophon giving also the exact date (1807 CE) and place of writing (Bhaktapur).
abstractShort: A Nepalese paper manuscript containing invocations to Avalokiteśvata and the Sukhāvatiloka, allegedly called Stutidharmaśāstra
title: Stutidharmaśāntu
